title: Get set up in two steps
subtitle: Put your events in your calendar and choose how you want to stay in the loop.
addToLocalCalendar: Add your events to your local calendar
addToCalendarDesc: Add your EveryCal feed to your calendar app. Events you mark as Going or Maybe will sync automatically.
emailNotificationsDesc: We can send you reminders and updates about events you're attending.
whenEventChanges: When an event's time or details change
